title: Text Page, "Cover Sheet for " Sintesi di Primavera (Bozetto Completo)" ["Spring Sytheses, Complete Sketch"], from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980
markings: Watermark across upper and lower edges of sheet:  Ingres-Fabriano
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, lower right:  Luce Balla, Elica Balla
description: Title page of third plate.  Text in vertical block, flush right, with title of plate 3 at upper right corner;  authorization of reproductive prints with list of prints below.  [See 1999-6-5-5.]

tombstone.epitaph:
Text Page, "Cover Sheet for " Sintesi di Primavera (Bozetto Completo)" ["Spring Sytheses, Complete Sketch"], from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Letterpress on cream laid paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-9.
